sections.text:
79-1503.Education Commission of the States; bylaws; file.

Pursuant to Article III (i) of the Compact for Education, the Education Commission of the States shall file a copy of its bylaws and any amendment thereto with the Governor.

SourceLaws 1967, c. 516, ยง 3, p. 1737;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-2503;Laws 1996, LB 900, ยง 1002.
